Position Title:              FF&E DesignerEmployment Type:      Full-timeSalary:                         up to 10K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:              Dubai, UAE About the Client:  A well-known restaurant group with unique concepts across Middle East Job Description:  Conduct comprehensive research then establish and maintain reliable network of suppliers of FF&E
Collaborate with the design team to understand project requirements, objectives and aesthetic goals
Prepare detailed FF&E specifications and schedules, including materials, finishes, dimensions, and quantities
Coordinate and track the delivery of FF&E items, ensuring timely and accurate installation on-site
Conduct quality checks on delivered FF&E items to ensure they meet the specified standards and requirementsSkills
